    • Uses of RequestEvent in com.stormpath.sdk.servlet.account.event

      Subinterfaces of RequestEvent in com.stormpath.sdk.servlet.account.event 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AccountRequestEvent
      An event triggered when something interesting happens to a particular Account while handling an HttpServletRequest.
      interface  RegisteredAccountRequestEvent
      An event triggered when processing an HttpServletRequest that results in a newly registered Account.
      interface  VerifiedAccountRequestEvent
      An event triggered when processing an HttpServletRequest that indicates an account's email address has been verified.

    • Uses of RequestEvent in com.stormpath.sdk.servlet.authc

      Subinterfaces of RequestEvent in com.stormpath.sdk.servlet.authc 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  AuthenticationRequestEvent
      An event that indicates an authentication attempt has occurred while handling an HttpServletRequest.
      interface  FailedAuthenticationRequestEvent
      Event that indicates an authentication attempt executed while handling an HttpServletRequest has failed.
      interface  LogoutRequestEvent
      An event triggered when a user account explicitly (manually) logs out of a web application.
      interface  SuccessfulAuthenticationRequestEvent
      Event that indicates an authentication attempt executed while handling an HttpServletRequest was successful.
